GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v5.10.88
GSD.description:
media: mxl111sf: change mutex_init() location

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.88 by commit b99bdf127af91d53919e96292c05f737c45ea59a, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit 8572211842afc53c8450fb470f2b8d02ba7592e0. For more details please see the references link.
